title: My IDA have 2 different address for same code How to change it
content: I am a novice for use ida pro and I do not know I change some settings that are maked left analyse address wrong.How I fix it?Thanks

comments.text: What is on the left and what is on the right?

You need to tell us how you got the left and the right IDA screenshots. Did you load an EXE file? Did you attach using the built-in debugger? Did you set special flags while loading? Is it the same database file?

answers_data.content: That does not appear to be the same binary; they appear to be different, but closely-related versions of the same program. On the right, the instruction at address 0x1417DDCE1 is followed by another instruction at address 0x1417DDCE8 . On the left, the instruction at address 0x1417DDCE1 is followed by another instruction at address 0x1417DDCE5 . (I.e., the last nibble on the left is 5 and the last nibble on the right is 8 .)

comments.text: No it is a same dump file.Left's address are analyse wrong.Thank you for your reply
